banner.title: IOM Transparency Portal
banner.description: [SAMPLE TEXT] Find data about IOM activities around the world. Thanks to IATI standard we share information about our daily work with migrants.
banner.detail: Track money flow from donation to employment. Understanding our mission is the first step to give value to our projects and keep them alive.
banner.text.text: In 2016 IOM spent US$ 1,602,307,417 in over 100 countries around the world in seven different service areas.
